Installation¶

Kalkayotl needs the following packages:

numpy >= 1.14
emcee >= 2.2.1
scipy >= 1.0

Additionally but not necessarily, if you want to analyse the different types of prior, then you will need:

matplotlib  >= 2.1.1
pandas      >= 0.22
progressbar >= 2.3
astroML     >= 0.3

The code has a GPL 3.0 licence, thus you can download it at GitHub kalkayotl. .
